result.execSummary:
The defendant Sheila Kay Monrial Garza was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Misappropriate ID Info - Obtain Money, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.201(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Bail applied to Costs and DNA Surcharge.  Paid in full.  Remainder of bail to be refunded to poster.

Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Sheila Kay Monrial Garza in court with attorney Katie B. Kegel.  Ted Szczupakiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant pleads guilty to Count #1. Court finds defendant guilty of Count #1. State makes recommendations. Atty. Kegel makes statements. Defendant makes statements. Case #17CF338 is dismissed and read in to this case. 

The Court Orders the Following: Count #1

Imposed and Stayed Sentence of:

10 Months Huber with STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS.  (Credit - 2 days).  STAYED.

Term of Probation: 30 Months

Conditions of Probation:

-Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
	
-No contact with Cory K. or Rosa S.

-Maintain/Obtain full time employment;

Condition Time: 10 days Huber with  NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - To commence 9/1/17 at 5:00 p.m.

COSTS:  $278.00 (Cash bail posted to be applied)

DNA Surcharge: $250.00 (Cash bail posted to be applied)

DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 

Felony warnings, immigration warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.  

Remaining cash bail to be returned to poster.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 28, 2017 at 02:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 2, 2017 at 09:00 am.
